thread.title: Trump to Greet Visiting Saudi Prince with a Crowded Agenda

author: Dion Nissenbaum
title: Trump to Greet Visiting Saudi Prince with a Crowded Agenda
text:
President Donald Trump hailed Saudi Arabia as a “great friend” as he welcomed its visiting Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman to the Oval Office for meetings on strengthening ties between the two countries and combating Iran’s influence in the Middle East.
At the same time, the U.S. Senate held a contentious debate over a resolution that seeks to cut off American military support for Saudi Arabia’s military campaign in Yemen.
The... RELATED VIDEO Prince Mohammed bin Salman's Ambitious Plans for Saudi Arabia Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman has huge ambitions for change in Saudi Arabia. But will his reforms also mean greater turbulence in the Middle East? WSJ's Niki Blasina reports. Photo: Getty
